channel.title: [PI] Admin Problems
channel.description: Ok so i found out how to make it so admins cant trade or sell items but can someone tell me how can i make it so that they cant drop either so everything they drop disappears. Cuz for some reason the public boolean in config.java says to type false to make it so they cant drop items but it didnt work

item.title: [PI] Admin Problems
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

zingerman111:

but doesnt that allow then to trade then

Oh, then change it to false. My bad I did not read the whole thing

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Admin Problems
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“zingerman111, post:1, topic:422169”]Ok so i found out how to make it so admins cant trade or sell items but can someone tell me how can i
make it so that they cant drop either so everything they drop disappears. Cuz for some reason the
public boolean in config.java says to type false to make it so they cant drop items but it didnt work[/quote]

In config.java it will say //Can admins trade? Change those to true.

Read full topic
